name: school
trans: A place where children go to learn and be taught by teachers

name: science
trans: The study of the natural world through observation and experiments

name: season
trans: One of the four parts of the year: spring, summer, fall, or winter

name: secret
trans: Something that is kept hidden or known by only a few people

name: sentence
trans: A group of words that expresses a complete thought

name: shape
trans: The form or outline of something, like a circle, square, or triangle

name: shout
trans: To speak or cry out very loudly

name: silent
trans: Making no sound; completely quiet

name: simple
trans: Easy to understand or do; not complicated

name: since
trans: From a particular time in the past until now

name: snow
trans: White frozen flakes of water that fall from the sky in cold weather

name: someone
trans: A person, but you don't know or say who exactly

name: sometimes
trans: On some occasions but not always

name: soon
trans: In a short time from now; before long

name: sound
trans: Something that you hear

name: space
trans: An empty area or room; also the area beyond Earth where stars and planets are

name: spring
trans: The season between winter and summer when flowers bloom

name: stand
trans: To be upright on your feet; not sitting or lying down

name: station
trans: A place where trains or buses stop to let people on and off

name: story
trans: A tale or account of events, real or imaginary

name: study
trans: To spend time learning about something

name: sudden
trans: Happening quickly and unexpectedly

name: summer
trans: The warmest season of the year, between spring and fall

name: surprise
trans: An unexpected event or gift that makes you feel amazed

name: swim
trans: To move through water using your arms and legs

name: table
trans: A piece of furniture with a flat top and legs, used for eating or working

name: teacher
trans: A person whose job is to help students learn

name: together
trans: With each other; in the same place or at the same time

name: tomorrow
trans: The day after today

name: tonight
trans: The night of this day; the coming night

name: touch
trans: To feel something with your hands or fingers

name: travel
trans: To go from one place to another, especially to far away places

name: trouble
trans: Problems or difficulties; a situation that causes worry

name: truth
trans: What is real and correct; the opposite of a lie

name: uncle
trans: The brother of your mother or father, or the husband of your aunt

name: understand
trans: To know the meaning of something or how something works

name: useful
trans: Helpful; able to be used for a good purpose

name: usual
trans: Normal; what happens most of the time

name: vacation
trans: A time when you don't go to school or work and can relax or travel

name: valley
trans: A low area of land between hills or mountains

name: village
trans: A small community or group of houses in the countryside, smaller than a town

name: visit
trans: To go to see a person or place for a short time

name: voice
trans: The sound you make when you speak or sing

name: wait
trans: To stay in a place until something happens or someone arrives

name: watch
trans: To look at something carefully for a period of time

name: waterfall
trans: A place where water flows over the edge of a cliff or rock

name: weather
trans: The condition outside, like sunny, rainy, or snowy

name: welcome
trans: To greet someone in a friendly way when they arrive

name: whisper
trans: To speak very quietly, using your breath more than your voice

name: window
trans: An opening in a wall with glass that lets light in and lets you see outside

name: winter
trans: The coldest season of the year, between fall and spring

name: without
trans: Not having or not using something

name: wonder
trans: To think about something and want to know more; to be curious

name: wonderful
trans: Extremely good; making you feel very happy

name: wood
trans: The hard material that comes from trees

name: world
trans: The Earth and all the people and places on it

name: worry
trans: To feel anxious or concerned about something

name: wrong
trans: Not correct; not right; a mistake

name: yesterday
trans: The day before today

name: young
trans: Not old; in an early stage of life

name: zebra
trans: An African animal like a horse with black and white stripes

name: across
trans: From one side to the other side of something

name: afraid
trans: Feeling fear or worry about something

name: angry
trans: Feeling very annoyed or mad about something

name: anyone
trans: Any person at all; it doesn't matter who

name: arrive
trans: To reach a place; to get somewhere

name: balloon
trans: A colorful rubber bag that is filled with air or gas and floats

name: beautiful
trans: Very pretty or pleasing to look at

name: believe
trans: To think that something is true or real

name: between
trans: In the space or time separating two things

name: bright
trans: Giving out a lot of light; shining strongly

name: bring
trans: To carry or take something with you to a place

name: butterfly
trans: An insect with large colorful wings

name: castle
trans: A large strong building with towers and thick walls, often where kings and queens lived

name: change
trans: To make something different; to become different

name: clothes
trans: Things you wear on your body, like shirts, pants, and dresses

name: complete
trans: Having all the necessary parts; finished

name: country
trans: A nation with its own government; also, land outside of cities

name: cousin
trans: The child of your aunt or uncle

name: create
trans: To make something new

name: decide
trans: To make a choice about something

name: describe
trans: To tell or write what something or someone is like

name: discover
trans: To find or learn something for the first time

name: doctor
trans: A person who helps sick or injured people get better

name: dream
trans: Pictures and events in your mind while you sleep; also a hope for the future

name: during
trans: Throughout the time that something is happening

name: early
trans: Near the beginning of a time period; before the usual time

name: enjoy
trans: To get pleasure from something; to like doing something

name: enough
trans: As much as needed; the right amount

name: evening
trans: The time of day between afternoon and night

name: family
trans: A group of people related to each other, especially parents and children

name: famous
trans: Known by many people; well-known

name: finish
trans: To complete something; to reach the end

name: follow
trans: To go behind someone or something; to come after

name: friend
trans: A person you like and enjoy spending time with

name: future
trans: The time that will come after now; what hasn't happened yet

name: garden
trans: A piece of land where flowers, vegetables, or fruits are grown

name: gentle
trans: Kind, calm, and careful; not rough or violent

name: giant
trans: Extremely large; also a very big creature in stories

name: group
trans: A number of people or things that are together
